reviewText: it was made in france so i cannot play it. wasted my money.

I put the tape in the VCR and immediately got a message that the tape could not be played in this region.  It was shipped from Germany.
So I have not been able to see it.

Why don't you put what region DVD this is usable in.
It can't be played on a DVD here in the states. We are a region 1. Come on guys.

I can't watch it because it is a Region 2 disc and can't be played on my DVD player. Also there was no designation on the website indicating it was Region 2. No warning whatsoever. I feel like I got ripped off.
